content.value:
Alameda Hostel Cali is located in one of the most traditional neighborhoods of Cali known for sea food and salsa clubs, very close to the tourist sites of the city. Y You will be a few minutes from emblematic sites such as La Topa Tolondra the trendy salsa club in the city, the Departmental Library that offers different cultural activities and a few minutes from San Antonio, the City Center, Granada and El Peñon.

At Alameda Hostel Cali each apartment comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, a seating area with a sofa, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer.

Located in Cali in the Valle del Cauca region, with Jorge Garcés Borrero Library and Cali's city Theatre nearby, Hostel Alameda Cali provides accommodation with free WiFi.
Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, a seating area with a sofa, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer.

Pan-American Park is 2.2 km from the apartment, while Saint's Peter Cathedral is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International, 23 km from Hostel Alameda Cali, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description.description: When staying at Alameda Hostel Cali you will live the experience of being a Caleño. Buying fruits and vegetables in the market square of Alameda, eating the famous sea food of the sector and you will enjoy the afternoon breeze in the Alameda park where if you are very hot you can cool off at its fountains.
